description: Results of pathway analysis of apoptosis-related genes in OVCAR3 cells treated with Notch3 siRNA or control siRNA.  Proteins on this pathway have targeted assays available via the [CPTAC Assay Portal](https://assays.cancer.gov/available_assays?wp_id=WP2864).
title: Apoptosis-related network due to altered Notch3 in ovarian cancer
